## Download answers

### User Experience Question

```{r download-answers-1}
question_text(
	"How many minutes, approximately, did it take you to complete this tuorial? For example, an hour and a half would be 90 minutes.",
	answer(NULL, correct = TRUE),
	allow_retry = TRUE,
	try_again_button = "Retry",
	incorrect = NULL)
```

```{r write-label-list, echo = FALSE}

# Get labels of all chunks defined till this point
# and write it to a system file to be read in server context

lbls <- knitr::all_labels()

saveRDS(lbls, file = system.file("www/label_list.rds", package = "primer.tutorials"))
```

```{r context = "server"}
submission_server()
```
